thread.section_title: Comedy Driving, Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Comedy Driving, Inc. | comedydriving.com
thread.title: Nancy Hansen
thread.title_full: Comedy Driving, Inc. reviewed by Nancy Hansen

author: Nancy Hansen
title: Nancy Hansen
text: This program/company was cute and funny, but at the same time quite educational. I even had my 15 year old son setting with me during a couple of modules as I thought they really brought home information I wanted him to know and understand before he started driving. I will certainly recommend this program/company to anyone!!
